titles.title: O For A Faith That Will Not Shrink

authors.author: Carl G. Glaser William H. Bathurst

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O for a faith that will not shrink, newline Tho' pressed by ev'ry foe, newline That will not tremble on the brink newline Of any earthly woe!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: That will not murmur nor complain, newline Beneath the chastening rod newline But in the hour of grief or pain, newline Will lean upon its God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: A faith that shines more bright and clear newline When tempests rage without; newline That when in danger knows no fear, newline In darkness feels no doubt.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: That bears, unmoved, the world's dread frown, newline Nor heeds its scornful smile; newline That seas of trouble cannot drown, newline Nor Satan's arts beguile.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Lord give us such a faith as this; newline And then whate'er may come, newline We'll taste e'en here the hollowed bliss, newline Of an eternal home.
